product.name: Natural Extracted Edible Oil
product.description: Natural Extracted Edible Oil is an excellent choice if you're looking for a healthier alternative. We extract using a method that doesn't involve excessive heat or chemicals, which helps retain more nutrients and antioxidants compared to other extraction methods.

product.name: Assorted Coffee
product.description: The unique blend of beans is sure to please every coffee lover. The instant coffee format allows you to enjoy the signature BRU taste in a convenient and easy way, no matter where you are

product.name: Hand Sanitizer
product.description: Washing your hands with soap and water is the best way to reduce the number of microbes on them. However, there can be situations where soap and/ or water are not available. In this situation where nothing else really helps,Hand Sanitize₹ can give you that protection and safety to ensure upto 99.99% Germ Protection.

product.name: Handpicked Red Chillies
product.description: Spices like coriander, mustard seeds, ginger, cinnamon, and cardamom are essential across various Indian cuisines. Handpicked Red Chillies are completely free from artificial colou₹ and preservatives.
